name: OrthographicMapping
0:
”Alexa, open Orthographic Mapping”
”Alexa, start Orthographic Mapping”
”Alexa, launch Orthographic Mapping”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: orthographic mapping
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill explores orthographic mapping and its importance in learning to read. Within this skill, users will learn the definition of orthographic mapping, explore how children learn to read, make connections between orthographic mapping and skilled reading, and learn foundational instructional practices related to orthographic mapping. Individuals who finish the skill are eligible to receive a certificate of completion indicating .5 hours of professional development that may be utilized, where accepted, for teacher relicensure credit. The Orthographic Mapping Skill is part of a series, which includes the Dyslexia Awareness Skill. Additional skills focused on dyslexia and struggling readers will be available soon. 

Please note, the information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
